basics.name: Travis West
basics.summary: Looking for a part‑time job to gain experience, grow responsibility, and contribute to the team. I’m reliable, learn quickly, and take pride in doing the job right.

highlights: Started and ran a small detailing business and handled scheduling and customer communication.
Hired and trained a small team to help during busy weeks.
Focused on doing the job right so customers were happy and came back.

projects.name: Custom LED Hexagon Light
highlights: Built a modular LED hexagon light like Govee/Nanoleaf, controlled by a microcontroller.
Assembled 3D‑printed parts with brass inserts and screws for a sturdy frame.
Cut and soldered LED strips, then wired power and control to the microcontroller.
